从医院到酒店：旋转医生将生病视为一次冒险。它不是。上一次我踏上飞机去度假、玩乐已经是三年多前的事了。我没能去加利福尼亚州，我很喜欢那里的海岸。也不是罗马，我和我丈夫在那里住过一段时间。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231122/From-hospital-to-hospitality-Spin-doctors-brand-getting-sick-as-an-adventure-Ite28099s-not.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231122/From-hospital-to-hospitality-Spin-doctors-brand-getting-sick-as-an-adventure-Ite28099s-not.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=f0e73918-630d-4f1a-a9ed-6095d9041744 Wed, 22 Nov 2023 06:02:58 -0500 From hospital to hospitality: Spin doctors brand getting sick as an adventure. It’s not.
